sentence: "There is enormous anxiety here in Georgia among republicans that Donald Trump will start to attack not just Brian Kemp, but also Georgia's election apparatus, and have a replay of the 2021 runoffs here in Georgia when two Republican senators lost their seats when those Trump [voters] stayed home and didn't back the two Republican senators," continued Murphy.
author: Matthew Chapman
title: 'Enormous anxiety' among Georgia GOP that Trump will sabotage them again this fall: reporter
